title: Note Taking App
features: Developed a dynamic note-taking application using React, enabling users to create, update, and delete notes with a rich-text editor.
Implemented a responsive user interface with a split-screen layout using the react-split library.
Utilised Firebase Firestore for real-time synchronisation of notes, ensuring data is consistent across sessions and devices
Managed state using React hooks (useState, useEffect) to handle complex interactions and asynchronous data updates.
Integrated real-time updates and snapshot listeners from Firebase Firestore to maintain up-to-date notes without having to manually refresh.

title: Van Rental App
features: Developed a comprehensive van rental web application using React, allowing users to browse, view details, about vans.
Created an admin dashboard for hosts to manage van listings, review income, and read customer reviews.
Implemented dynamic routing with react-router-dom for seamless navigation, including protected host-specific routes.
Utilised Firebase Firestore for real-time data storage and retrieval.
Built a user-friendly host dashboard with features to update pricing, upload photos, and monitor earnings and reviews.
Used React hooks (useState, useEffect) for state management and asynchronous data operations.

title: To-Do List
features: Implemented Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations to manage tasks, allowing users to create new tasks, update existing ones, and remove tasks they no longer need.
Clean and responsive user interface with intuitive design
Implemented React hooks (useState, useEffect) for state and effect management:
